attributes.action: ensure rail fares are cheaper than driving for individual travellers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently it seems that the UK rail operators are making it more expensive excluding any one time discounts to travel by rail than to travel the same distance as a single person in a car. 

This is so contrary to the governments position on CO2 emissions and climate change agenda that there should be a concerted effort in government to ensure that... "It's cheaper by rail".

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "ensure rail fares are cheaper than driving for individual travellers."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22240


Prime Minister's Office
